content: this shawl knitting pattern is inspired by jenny s shawl from outlander worn by jenny murray loaned to mary mcnab when she visits jamie in the cave and later seen on janet jenny s daughter this pattern will allow you to create a large triangle shawl with a ruffled edge/border to knit this shawl you will have to knit short row to create the ruffle on the edge/border of the shawl yarn yarn used - cascade 220/100% wool - iridescence 8872 yarn - 100g/219 yards/200m x 3 s x 4 m 5 l/xl x 6+ xl/xxl yarn weight - medium weight 04/worsted/aran/10 ply please note - the shawl in the photographs is size m - and used 4 skeins of the cascade 220 yarn needles 5mm us 8 knitting needles i used my interchangeable circular needles on a 100cm/40′′ cable as there were many stitches skills level intermediate this is an intermediate-level knitting pattern and the techniques involved are the knit stitch short row shaping casting on and casting off the border of the shawl is created by short-row shaping there is a link to a video tutorial on my youtube channel included to help you complete the ruffle border sizing please note these sizes are just a rough guide you can knit this shawl until it is comfortable for you to wear test it out against yourself to see if you want to make the length shorter or longer before casting off instagram @handylittleme facebook facebook com/handylittleme ravelry ravelry com/people/handylittleme pinterest pinterest co uk/handylittleme copyright the patterns and photographs of this design are the property of handy little me this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern collection or any items created using the directions in this pattern collection without consent please visit my terms of use page for additional information 1 https //www handylittleme com/jennys-shawl-knitting-pattern-outlander-knit/ 2 https //www handylittleme com/product/outlander-jennys-shawl-knitting-pattern-pdf/ 3 https //www handylittleme com/product/outlander-knitting-patterns/
